english.segment1: Everything will work out. Everything will work out. For Your glory. I know Youll use it all
english.segment2: Fall upon Your mercy. Call upon Your kindness. Will You come to me. And search my heart again
english.segment3: And Im on my knees waiting here for You. In Your holy place. And my heart is home. In Your courts oh Lord. How I long for You
english.segment4: Everything will work out. Everything will work out. When I see You. Ill know Ill understand
english.segment5: And Im my knees. Waiting here for You. In your holy place. And my heart is home. In your courts oh Lord. How I long for you
